update.description:
The next major version of gazebo (11) will use the versions of ignition dependencies corresponding to ignition citadel. These dependencies require c++17 and cmake 3.10. These dependencies are available in Ubuntu Bionic, but not xenial. The planned list of these versions is in the following pull requests:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/48/add-the-citadel-gazebodistro-file/diff

There is a significant API change required: ignition-math6 renamed the `ignition::math::Box` class to `ignition::math::AxisAlignedBox`, so this type is changed in any API's that used `ignition::math::Box` in 39d46a2. There are also some API changes to `ignition::math::Inertial` (see 46356e6), but that doesn't affect gazebo's API.

There's also a significant behavior change in ~~ignition-msgs4~~ ignition-msgs5, which now uses the proto3 syntax, which doesn't allow optional fields. So I've removed all checks for optional fields in fda2ce1. This commit should be reviewed carefully.

~~ignition-fuel-tools3~~ ignition-fuel-tools4 is now a required dependency instead of an optional dependency.

This requires ~~sdformat8 8.4.0~~ sdformat9 9.0.0 (currently a prerelease). The windows build requires the following gazebodistro PR:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
update.title: Update to ignition citadel dependencies, c++17, cmake 3.10

update.description:
The next major version of gazebo (11) will use the versions of ignition dependencies corresponding to ignition citadel. These dependencies require c++17 and cmake 3.10. These dependencies are available in Ubuntu Bionic, but not xenial. The planned list of these versions is in the following pull requests:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/48/add-the-citadel-gazebodistro-file/diff

There is a significant API change required: ignition-math6 renamed the `ignition::math::Box` class to `ignition::math::AxisAlignedBox`, so this type is changed in any API's that used `ignition::math::Box` in 39d46a2. There are also some API changes to `ignition::math::Inertial` (see 46356e6), but that doesn't affect gazebo's API.

There's also a significant behavior change in ~~ignition-msgs4~~ ignition-msgs5, which now uses the proto3 syntax, which doesn't allow optional fields. So I've removed all checks for optional fields in fda2ce1. This commit should be reviewed carefully.

~~ignition-fuel-tools3~~ ignition-fuel-tools4 is now a required dependency instead of an optional dependency.

This requires ~~sdformat8 8.4.0~~ sdformat9 9.0.0 (currently a prerelease). The windows build requires the following gazebodistro PR:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff

content.raw:
it's now failing to compile with msgs5 due to a removed field from image.proto

* https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/158/remove-deprecations-in-ign-msgs5/diff#Lproto/ignition/msgs/image.protoF67

~~~
gazebo/sensors/CameraSensor.cc: In member function ‘virtual bool gazebo::sensors::CameraSensor::UpdateImpl(bool)’:
gazebo/sensors/CameraSensor.cc:249:11: error: ‘class ignition::msgs::Image’ has no member named ‘set_pixel_format’; did you mean ‘set_pixel_format_type’?
       msg.set_pixel_format(common::Image::ConvertPixelFormat(
           ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           set_pixel_format_type
~~~

we'll need to convert to the ign-msgs enum
content.html:
it's now failing to compile with msgs5 due to a removed field from image.proto

  • https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/158/remove-deprecations-in-ign-msgs5/diff#Lproto/ignition/msgs/image.protoF67
gazebo/sensors/CameraSensor.cc: In member function ‘virtual bool gazebo::sensors::CameraSensor::UpdateImpl(bool)’:
gazebo/sensors/CameraSensor.cc:249:11: error: ‘class ignition::msgs::Image’ has no member named ‘set_pixel_format’; did you mean ‘set_pixel_format_type’?
       msg.set_pixel_format(common::Image::ConvertPixelFormat(
           ^~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           set_pixel_format_type

we'll need to convert to the ign-msgs enum

pull_request.title: Update to ignition citadel dependencies, c++17, cmake 3.10

update.description:
The next major version of gazebo (11) will use the versions of ignition dependencies corresponding to ignition citadel. These dependencies require c++17 and cmake 3.10. These dependencies are available in Ubuntu Bionic, but not xenial. The planned list of these versions is in the following pull requests:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/48/add-the-citadel-gazebodistro-file/diff

There is a significant API change required: ignition-math6 renamed the `ignition::math::Box` class to `ignition::math::AxisAlignedBox`, so this type is changed in any API's that used `ignition::math::Box` in 39d46a2. There are also some API changes to `ignition::math::Inertial` (see 46356e6), but that doesn't affect gazebo's API.

There's also a significant behavior change in ~~ignition-msgs4~~ ignition-msgs5, which now uses the proto3 syntax, which doesn't allow optional fields. So I've removed all checks for optional fields in fda2ce1. This commit should be reviewed carefully.

~~ignition-fuel-tools3~~ ignition-fuel-tools4 is now a required dependency instead of an optional dependency.

This requires ~~sdformat8 8.4.0~~ sdformat9 9.0.0 (currently a prerelease). The windows build requires the following gazebodistro PR:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
update.title: Update to ignition citadel dependencies, c++17, cmake 3.10

update.description:
The next major version of gazebo (11) will use the versions of ignition dependencies corresponding to ignition citadel. These dependencies require c++17 and cmake 3.10. These dependencies are available in Ubuntu Bionic, but not xenial. The planned list of these versions is in the following pull requests:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/48/add-the-citadel-gazebodistro-file/diff

There is a significant API change required: ignition-math6 renamed the `ignition::math::Box` class to `ignition::math::AxisAlignedBox`, so this type is changed in any API's that used `ignition::math::Box` in 39d46a2. There are also some API changes to `ignition::math::Inertial` (see 46356e6), but that doesn't affect gazebo's API.

There's also a significant behavior change in ignition-msgs4, which now uses the proto3 syntax, which doesn't allow optional fields. So I've removed all checks for optional fields in fda2ce1. This commit should be reviewed carefully.

ignition-fuel-tools3 is now a required dependency instead of an optional dependency.

This requires sdformat8 8.4.0 (currently a prerelease). The windows build requires the following gazebodistro PR:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
update.title: Update to ignition citadel dependencies, c++17, cmake 3.10

content.raw: there was a linking error with a plugin failing to find `-lgts`, but that should need to be a public library export, so I use the `PRIVATE` keyword in the `target_link_libraries` commands for gazebo_common in df6c4eb
content.html: there was a linking error with a plugin failing to find -lgts, but that should need to be a public library export, so I use the PRIVATE keyword in the target_link_libraries commands for gazebo_common in df6c4eb

There is a significant API change required: ignition-math6 renamed the `ignition::math::Box` class to `ignition::math::AxisAlignedBox`, so this type is changed in any API's that used `ignition::math::Box` in 39d46a2. There are also some API changes to `ignition::math::Inertial` (see 46356e6), but that doesn't affect gazebo's API.

There's also a significant behavior change in ignition-msgs4, which now uses the proto3 syntax, which doesn't allow optional fields. So I've removed all checks for optional fields in fda2ce1. This commit should be reviewed carefully.

ignition-fuel-tools3 is now a required dependency instead of an optional dependency.

This requires sdformat8 8.4.0 (currently a prerelease). The windows build requires the following gazebodistro PR:

content.raw:
I tried using Fuel with Gazebo 9.11.0 as follows:

1. Change `url` in `~/.ignition/fuel/config.yaml` to `https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org`
1. Open Gazebo with `USE_IGNITION_FUEL=true gazebo --verbose`
1. Wait a long time until the model list is populated on the Insert menu
1. Choose a model to insert. Some of them showed up as the preview that is attached to the mouse, but after I click they disappear.
content.html:
I tried using Fuel with Gazebo 9.11.0 as follows:

  1. Change url in ~/.ignition/fuel/config.yaml to https://fuel.ignitionrobotics.org
  2. Open Gazebo with USE_IGNITION_FUEL=true gazebo --verbose
  3. Wait a long time until the model list is populated on the Insert menu
  4. Choose a model to insert. Some of them showed up as the preview that is attached to the mouse, but after I click they disappear.

pull_request.title: Update to ignition citadel dependencies, c++17, cmake 3.10

update.description:
The next major version of gazebo (11) will use the versions of ignition dependencies corresponding to ignition citadel. These dependencies require c++17 and cmake 3.10. These dependencies are available in Ubuntu Bionic, but not xenial. The planned list of these versions is in the following pull requests:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/48/add-the-citadel-gazebodistro-file/diff

There is a significant API change required: ignition-math6 renamed the `ignition::math::Box` class to `ignition::math::AxisAlignedBox`, so this type is changed in any API's that used `ignition::math::Box` in 39d46a2. There are also some API changes to `ignition::math::Inertial` (see 46356e6), but that doesn't affect gazebo's API.

There's also a significant behavior change in ignition-msgs4, which now uses the proto3 syntax, which doesn't allow optional fields. So I've removed all checks for optional fields in fda2ce1. This commit should be reviewed carefully.

ignition-fuel-tools3 is now a required dependency instead of an optional dependency.

This requires sdformat8 8.4.0 (currently a prerelease). The windows build requires the following gazebodistro PR:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff

content.raw:
there are some issues with the lack of optional fields in proto3. I will consider reverting the joint controller from `ignition::msgs::JointCmd` to using `gazebo::msgs::JointCmd` since it is still in proto2

we might need to modify `ignition::msgs::JointCmd` if it will use the proto3 syntax
content.html:
there are some issues with the lack of optional fields in proto3. I will consider reverting the joint controller from ignition::msgs::JointCmd to using gazebo::msgs::JointCmd since it is still in proto2

we might need to modify ignition::msgs::JointCmd if it will use the proto3 syntax

There's also a significant behavior change in ignition-msgs4, which now uses the proto3 syntax, which doesn't allow optional fields. So I've removed all checks for optional fields in fda2ce1. This commit should be reviewed carefully.

ignition-fuel-tools3 is now a required dependency instead of an optional dependency.

This requires sdformat8 8.4.0 (currently a prerelease). The windows build requires the following gazebodistro PR:

* #!/osrf/gazebodistro/pull-requests/49/gazebo11yaml-using-ignition-citadel/diff
update.title: Update to ignition citadel dependencies, c++17, cmake 3.10
